title.narrative: Learning, building and communicating evidence and support to existing programmes

description.narrative: This activity (Learning, building and communicating evidence and support to existing programmes) is a component of La Pepiniere: Programme for adolescent girls in the Democratic Republic of Congo reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £2,736,324. This component benefits Congo (Democratic Republic), and works in the following sector(s): Media and free flow of information, Social Protection, Research/scientific institutions. , with the following implementing partners: Overseas Development Institute, Social Development Direct Limited. The start date is 01-04-2014 and the end date is 31-10-2017.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA

sector.narrative: Media and free flow of information
